comments.body: XML documentation comments use HTML-escaped tags. Use proper XML tags (e.g., <summary>) to ensure correct processing by documentation tools.
The lambda for DigitCommand accesses param.ToString()[0] without validating that the parameter is non-null and non-empty. Add proper checks to avoid potential runtime exceptions.
The lambda for OperatorCommand similarly accesses param.ToString()[0] without validation. Ensure input validation to prevent possible errors during execution.

The project file is nested within multiple 'calculator' folders. This folder structure may lead to namespace organization issues. Consider simplifying the directory structure for better maintainability.
There is only one test method covering basic arithmetic. Expanding test coverage to include edge cases and error scenarios is recommended to ensure robustness.
